name: Awaken the Residual Pari in the Fravashi Trees (North Tunigi Hollow 3)

starting_location.plaintext: North Tunigi Hollow, Girdle of the Sands , Sumeru

steps.plaintext: Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
steps.markdown: Let Sorush awaken the residual Pari in the ◀Fravashi Tree▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Fravashi_Tree▷

steps.plaintext: Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
steps.markdown: Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree

steps.plaintext: Look for the residual Pari fragments scattered around (0/3)
steps.markdown: Look for the residual Pari fragments scattered around (0/3)

steps.plaintext: Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
steps.markdown: Talk to the residual Pari in the Fravashi Tree
